discourse_list.title: CES Sprint Update #4 (2022/Q1 - Mar 14th to Mar 25th 2022)

content.content: As defined in the Collateral Management Lifecycle (CML) post, the life cycle implies two big focus areas for CES: Collateral Onboarding and Collateral Maintenance. Within these areas we categorize our output into a set of deliverables(COD1-3, CMD1, CMO1). CES provides a bi-monthly update synced with the end of each sprint (2 weeks work cycle). Questions❔ Join our Discord and engage with us! JOIN NOW  1600×598 89.3 KB  Roadmap: collapse version - only milestones. Timelines in these updates only include technical scope from CES CU. Most projects include work from other CUs and those timelines are not displayed in these updates.  Collateral Onboarding  COD1 - COB Process   1600×306 43.4 KB    EPIC: Collateral Onboarding Process Revamp  Monitor and amend RFCs:   MIP6c3-SP2: Modify the collateral application.  MIP4c2-SP18: MIP7 Amendments.  MIP7c3-SP7: CES Domain Team Onboarding.    Provided clarifications to the community on how CES will manage different collateral onboarding application options into the COB process while the full process revamp is in the making. Provided input from a technical advisory role to MIP67.   COD2 - Off Chain Collateral Onboarding   1600×526 66.5 KB    EPIC: Société Générale OFH Onboarding  Implemented new solution design for the updated OFH Token provided. Finalized DIIS Group UI. Internal demo for both money flows including DIIS UI interactions. Gathered feedback and improvements for the upcoming sprint.   EPIC: Off-chain Technical Advisory  Second touchpoint with Asia-Pacific banking group (RWA). Provided feedback on the forums for MIP65 and MIP68 Reviewed MIP6: Huntingdon Valley Bank Loan Syndication Collateral Onboarding Application    COD3 - On Chain Collateral Onboarding   1600×380 50.8 KB    EPIC: On-chain Technical Advisory  Updated Collateral Status Index (CSI) with poll status updates. Started an internal working version of the CSI to include new timestamps.   EPIC: MIP6: Establish collateral guidelines  Finalizing recommended guidelines for assessing MIP6 collateral onboarding applications. Forum post will be published very soon.   Collateral Maintenance  CMD1 - Collateral Operations   1600×306 42.8 KB    EPIC: Scope Collateral Maintenance  ORA CU to publish a Signal Request based upon the collaterals in the Collateral Offboarding Review document.  TUSD offboarding poll completed with a Yes and following the MIP62 process. The offboarding is currently blocked by a New TUSD Implementation Address.   General Updates  CMO1 - CU Management & Operations   1600×380 46 KB    EPIC: CES Budget Cycle  Published the March 2022 Budget Summary    EPIC: CES Operations  Continued vetting candidates for Collateral Program Manager position. Completed the onboarding of our new Project Manager, Arnulfo Taghoy   Previous Sprint Updates  CES Sprint Update #1 (2022/Q1 - Jan 31st to Feb 11th 2022) CES Sprint Update #2 (2022/Q1 - Feb 14th to Feb 25th 2022)  CES Sprint Update #3 (2022/Q1 - Feb 28th to Mar 11th 2022)
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

discourse_list.title: CES Sprint Update #2 (2022/Q1 - Feb 14th to Feb 25th 2022)

content.content: As defined in the Collateral Management Lifecycle (CML) post, the life cycle implies two big focus areas for CES: Collateral Onboarding and Collateral Maintenance. Within these areas we categorize our output into a set of deliverables(COD1-3, CMD1, CMO1). CES provides a bi-monthly update synced with the end of each sprint (2 weeks work cycle). Questions❔ Join our Discord and engage with us! JOIN NOW  1600×598 89.3 KB  Roadmap: collapse version - only milestones  Collateral Onboarding  COD1 - COB Process   1600×306 43.3 KB    EPIC: Collateral Onboarding Process Revamp   Collateral Onboarding Process document currently in RFC from stakeholders and core units.   COD2 - Off Chain Collateral Onboarding   1600×526 66.4 KB    EPIC: Société Générale OFH Onboarding  Created a helper smart contract to ease the operations when paying the loan, exiting the vault and unlocking the OFH tokens from the wrapper contract (wOFH) Reviewed the OFH token code base in order to clarify legal questions. Enabled SocGen to define any address as recipient for DAI in the Output Conduit smart contract. Started development of the GUI which will be used by DIIS Group.   EPIC: Off-chain Technical Advisory  Provided technical advisory support to RWF potential deals (names intentionally withheld).   COD3 - On Chain Collateral Onboarding   1600×380 50.8 KB    EPIC: On-board crvstETH as collateral  No update.   EPIC: On-chain Technical Advisory  Further support to PUNKS MIP6 application. Updated Collateral Status Index with poll status updates.   EPIC: MIP6: Establish collateral benchmarks  Continued work on defining metrics for which a benchmark for recommended collateral candidates for onboarding and offboarding can be created.   Collateral Maintenance  CMD1 - Collateral Operations   1600×306 42.7 KB    EPIC: Scope Collateral Maintenance  Collateral Offboarding Review document currently in RFC.   General Updates  CMO1 - CU Management & Operations   1600×380 46 KB    EPIC: CES Budget Cycle  Status: Poll passed - MIP40c3-SP57: Modify Core Unit Budget - Collateral Engineering Services (CES-001)   EPIC: CES Operations  New Team Member! Everyone welcome Arnulfo Taghoy @agtaghoyjr. He’ll be joining us as a Project Manager for CES. Two candidates identified for the Lead Smart Contract Engineering position. Posted the Collateral Program Manager position. Established a Discord channel to engage with Delegates. Stakeholder and CU alignment meetings at ETH Denver. All MakerDAO community members are welcomed to Join our Discord and engage with us! JOIN NOW    Previous Sprint Updates  CES Sprint Update #1 (2022/Q1 - Jan 31st to Feb 11th 2022)
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
